text: {{Infobox settlement | name = New Valley Governorate | settlement_type = Governorate | image_flag = Flag of New Valley Governorate.png | flag_size = 120px | image_blank_emblem = Coat of arms of New Valley Governorate.JPG | blank_emblem_size = 75px | image_map = New Valley in Egypt.svg | map_caption = New Valley Governorate on the map of Egypt | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Kharga (capital) | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | government_footnotes = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 440,098 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 245000 | population_as_of = January 2018 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | website = | iso_code = | calling_code = | footnotes = }} New Valley Governorate is a governorate in Egypt. The capital is at the Kharga Oasis. Another name used for the governorate is El Wadi El Gedid Governorate. New Valley is the largest governorate in Egypt. At 440,098 square kilometers in area, it is just slightly larger than the country of Iraq. == References ==
title: New Valley Governorate
